name: stream-username-corrector
description: Browser extension to change displayed usernames on Twitch

scripts.build: rollup --c --failAfterWarnings --no-stdin && cleancss -O2 specialComments:1 -o ./build/popup.css ./src/popup.css && html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --collapse-boolean-attributes --collapse-inline-tag-whitespace --remove-attribute-quotes --remove-empty-attributes --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --remove-style-link-type-attributes --sort-attributes -o ./build/popup.html ./src/popup.html && node src/index.js build
scripts.dist:chrome: npm run build && node src/index.js dist:chrome

author: SpikyTater
